title: What do different numbers mean in numerology? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can learn what numbers mean in numerology by studying the book and using its illustrated chart. If you are an amateur, you may want to read this article to discover the meaning of the number meanings of numbers, what is meant by the numerical figures and what they represent. The first thing that you should know about numerology is that it is not a scientific practice. People believe in it because they are looking for a way to understand their past or present lives and future. Some of them even think that it is a way to predict the future, so they buy books that they think will give them the answers they are looking for. They do not have the answers and they end up disappointed. You can learn what numbers mean in numerology by looking at the charts and understanding the meanings of the different numerals. You can be happy if you understand the meaning of the numbers and how numerology works. How do you know what numbers mean in numerology? It is very easy. You just need to remember the meaning of the different digits. You will be surprised at how easy it is. We all use the same alphabet and it does not matter if we use it the same way. We all use a form of writing and when you look at the numbers on the number charts, you should try to understand their meanings. The table of alphabets is used because it was the initial way of writing numbers that we had. Our modern ways of writing numbers did not exist back then and we did not use the same symbols that we use today. The alphabets used in other countries may look like ours, but they are written differently. They do not have the same meaning. People use the same alphabet and the same symbols when they use modern methods to write numbers, they also use the same pictographs. We use a numerical system but it is not the same one that existed before the alphabets and the pictographs. Therefore, the study of what numbers mean in numerology is very important. If you take a look at a chart and find the numbers that you want to know, you should know what the symbols represent. This is because the numerals mean different things depending on the number. The numbers of the alphabets, for example, are used to represent how we can use the numbers and what we should pay attention to. When you look at the symbols, you should be able to learn something about the meanings of the numbers. There are numbers that have spiritual meanings as well as numerology and it depends on how you interpret the symbols that you find on the charts. You may find that the most important point to remember is that you have to understand what numerology is all about before you are able to use it. The numbers that you use when you are reading your horoscope will also be related to the numbers that you have learned and you should use both numbers that are from your horoscope and the ones that you learn. In order to determine what numbers mean in numerology, you should learn what the numbers represent. You should try to figure out what they mean to you personally. Then you should take these numbers and compare them to the meaning of the symbols that you find on the chart. Try to understand the meaning of the different ones that you have learned and you will find that it will help you a lot in your practice of numerology. You should also know what numbers mean in numerology. The next time that you are reading your horoscope, you should look at the chart and find the numbers that you want to know. and you should also learn what the symbols mean so that you can see what they mean in numerology.

As per numerology numbers from 1 to 9 represents different planets. Like number 1 represent sun, 2 represents moon, 3 represents Jupiter and so on. These planets and astral bodies have their own characteristic features which they give to the owner of the number. For example, a person born on dates like 2, 11, 29 will have behaviour as that of the moon. Numbers play role in person’s life from birth till death.
